div_aria-describedby_aria-hidden_role_st:
To ensure that the `aria-hidden` elements are not focusable and do not contain focusable elements, you should remove the `tabindex` attribute or set it to `-1`. This will prevent the element from being focusable. Additionally, make sure that any focusable elements within the `div` have their `tabindex` set to `-1` as well. Here's the modified code: ```html
``` By setting `tabindex` to `-1`, the element and its focusable children will be removed from the normal tab order, making them inaccessible to keyboard users.
